title: Happy Birthday, Nozomi!
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Happy birthday, Nozomi<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Thanks, Yoshiko-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s Yohane. Well, whatever. Rejoice, Nozomi. According to Yohane’s divination, a not so bad future awaits you<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>You did a reading on me? Fufu, how kind<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Wha-.... It’s not out of kindness or anything. This is a warning. The moment you resign yourself to the solace of everyday life…. You will instantly be swept away by a big wave<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>So you’re telling me to be careful? See, you are being nice<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Like I said! That’s not it! ….Geez. Do you want anything for your birthday? I might as well give you a present<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Hmm~, Then, a matching tarot card case with Yoshiko-chan. We use the same tarot cards, right, Yoshiko-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>You knew!? That they were the same!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Of course I know. I’m happy in that regard<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>You’re…. Happy? That’s fine then. My tarot card case is handmade. So I’ll make you one for the next time we meet<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
